definitions.definition: Synonym of derailer : A device placed on railway tracks in order to cause a train to derail .
examples: The derail was placed deliberately so that the train would fall into the river.

definitions.definition: An instance of diverting a conversation or debate from its original topic .

main_definition: Synonym of derailer : A device placed on railway tracks in order to cause a train to derail .
secondary_definitions: An instance of diverting a conversation or debate from its original topic .
